titles.title: To support the Boy Scouts of America and the Girl Scouts of the United States of America.
To support the Boy Scouts of America and the Girl Scouts of the United States of America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Prohibits any Federal law, rule, or regulation from being construed to limit any Federal agency from providing any form of support to the Boy Scouts of America or the Girl Scouts of the United States of America, including: (1) holding meetings, jamborees, camporees, or other scouting activities on Federal property if such organization has received permission from the appropriate Federal official responsible for such property; or (2) hosting or sponsoring any official event of such organization.
